title: FGEHA, SCBAP, and DHA signs MoU for Park Road Housing Project
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 01 (APP):Federal Government Employees Housing Authority (FGEHA), Supreme Court Bar Association (SCBA) and Defense Housing Authority (DHA) on Thursday signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) for the development of Park Road Housing Project.
Federal Ministers Senator Azam Nazeer Tarar (Law and Justice), Riaz Hussain Pirzada (Housing and Works), and Syed Mohsin Raza Naqvi (Interior) attended the MoU signing ceremony.
This initiative underscores the governmentâ€™s commitment to the welfare of lawyers, said a press release. During the event, the secretary and president of SCBA praised the Law and Interior Ministers for their supportive roles.
Interior Minister Syed Mohsin Raza Naqvi assured full cooperation from the government.
Law Minister Azam Nazeer Tarar expressed gratitude to the Ministry of Housing and Works and DHA authorities for their support. He also commended the efforts of the Interior Minister. The MoU secures interests and ensures a smooth process for the project.
This housing project represents a significant step towards enhancing the welfare of the legal community.
